member.summary: Authentication handler for OAuth 2.0 introspection
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionHandler.Events
member.summary: The handler calls methods on the events which give the application control at certain points where processing is occurring. If it is not provided a default instance is supplied which does nothing when the methods are called.

member.name: M:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionHandler.HandleAuthenticateAsync
member.summary: Tries to authenticate a reference token on the current request

member.name: T:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions
member.summary: Options class for the OAuth 2.0 introspection endpoint authentication handler

member.name: M:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.#ctor
member.summary: ctor

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.Authority
member.summary: Sets the base-path of the token provider. If set, the OpenID Connect discovery document will be used to find the introspection endpoint.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.IntrospectionEndpoint
member.summary: Sets the URL of the introspection endpoint. If set, Authority is ignored.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.ClientId
member.summary: Specifies the id of the introspection client (required).

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.ClientSecret
member.summary: Specifies the shared secret of the introspection client.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.ClientAssertion
member.summary: Specifies the the client assertion to be used (optional replacement of simple client secret)

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.ClientCredentialStyle
member.summary: Specifies how client id and secret are being sent

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.AuthorizationHeaderStyle
member.summary: Specifies how the authorization header gets formatted (if used)

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.TokenTypeHint
member.summary: Specifies the token type hint of the introspection client.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.NameClaimType
member.summary: Specifies the claim type to use for the name claim (defaults to 'name')

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.RoleClaimType
member.summary: Specifies the claim type to use for the role claim (defaults to 'role')

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.AuthenticationType
member.summary: Specifies the authentication type to use for the authenticated identity. If not set, the authentication scheme name is used as the authentication type (defaults to null).

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.DiscoveryPolicy
member.summary: Specifies the policy for the discovery client

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.SkipTokensWithDots
member.summary: Specifies whether tokens that contain dots (most likely a JWT) are skipped

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.SaveToken
member.summary: Specifies whether the token should be stored in the context, and thus be available for the duration of the request

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.EnableCaching
member.summary: Specifies whether the outcome of the toke validation should be cached. This reduces the load on the introspection endpoint at the STS

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.CacheDuration
member.summary: Specifies for how long the outcome of the token validation should be cached.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.CacheKeyPrefix
member.summary: Specifies the prefix of the cache key (token).

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.TokenRetriever
member.summary: Specifies the method how to retrieve the token from the HTTP request

member.name: P:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.Events
member.summary: Gets or sets the used to handle authentication events.

member.name: M:IdentityModel.AspNetCore.OAuth2Introspection.OAuth2IntrospectionOptions.Validate
member.summary: Check that the options are valid. Should throw an exception if things are not ok.
member.exception: You must either set Authority or IntrospectionEndpoint or You must either set a ClientId or set an introspection HTTP handler
